title: A Day of Firsts
description: In A Day of Firsts, students will read about the fun things that await them on the first day of first grade. High-frequency words, repetitive phrases, and detailed photographs support readers. Students will have the opportunity to locate details that support the main idea as well as to ask and answer questions as they read this interesting book about the first day of school.
